text: he loko! Jo tamane tamara mrtyu pachina jivana vise sanka che, to vicaro! Ame tamarum sarjana mati vade karyum, pachi viryana tipa vade, pachi lohithi, pachi mansa vade, je cahero apavamam avyo hato ane ghata vagarano hato. A ame tamara para jahera kari da'i'e chi'e, ane ame jene icchi'e chi'e, eka nakki karela samaya sudhi matana garbhamam rakhi'e chi'e, pachi tamane balapanani avasthamam duniyamam lavi'e chi'e, jethi tame potani yuvavasthamam pahonci javo, tamara manthi ketalaka to te che, je'one mrtyu apavamam ave che ane ketalakane vrdvavastha'e pahoncadi devamam ave che ke te eka vastune janava chatam ajana bani jaya, tame joso ke dharati suki che, pachi jyare ame tena para varasada varasavi'e chi'e to te upaje che ane phule che ane dareka prakarani lobhamani upajo upajave che
